author: Alexander Salazar
comment: I bought the paid version but it doubles my lock screen. I have to go through the original watch lock screen  then this one and now after restart of watch it doesn't work at all. I really liked the concept
title: Not working right. Please tell me how to refund

author: Peter Logan
comment: Installed this on my doogee s1 smartwatch, and after about 2 mins, I get system authorization, you device will shut down in "20 sec" countdown timer and watch powers down.  Edit: installed, turned off Wi-Fi for hour, when turned back on it licences fine and works fine. Only crashes system if it tries to get licence straight after installing
title: Great but crashes watch

author: Arnold Sykes Jr
comment: Joke don't want to work.  Would have loved to have the trek app

author: Craig Rhea
comment: I like it

author: Rick Mac Gillis
comment: Demo text on a free app and crap controls.
title: Unlicensed demo version?

author: Prince Floyd
comment: This P.O.S don't work

author: Seungkoan Baek
comment: 계속 다시 실행해야하는 버거로움 환불해주세요
title: 자꾸 꺼져

comment: does not work on Finow Q1 smart watch...... uninstalled.

comment: It does not connect with my smartwatch.

comment: I like it so i buy it work cool on my android watch
title: Works good

comment: Very low resolution.

comment: Does not work

reply.author: Kurt Huwig
reply.content:
Hi Mark,

author: John Carter
comment: Won't even open :(:(:(
title: John Carter

author: Joachim Chipeta
comment: Very nice.

author: Joshua Gilbert
comment: Crap

author: Steve S
comment: Awsome

author: Michelle Haslam
comment: Installed app and purchased watchfaces, icon is there when go into Smart connect on phone but doesn't respond when clicked. Maybe I'm doing something wrong but currently it was a waste of money :-(
title: Doesn't seem to work with Sony Smartwatch 2!

author: Kris Allsop
comment: Appears as an app on Sony Smartwatch 2. The faces are excellent but you can't display them like a normal watch face. They're a waste of time. Shame because I'd give it 5 stars if you could actually use them.
title: Pointless on Sony Smartwatch 2

author: Sunette Heunes
comment: I downloaded the app but I am unable to use it with my gear watch. It picks up the faces in my phone but not the watch.  Pls can someone assist me or alt refund me my money.

reply.author: Kurt Huwig
reply.content: That's correct: as written in the app description, it does not work on the Samsung Gear 1 and 2, only on the Samsung Gear Live. I've refunded your purchase.

title: App not working on Gear watch

author: Gina Johnston
comment: I didn't notice that the app doesn't work on the 1st gear till it was too late. I have paid for a clock face through this app and can't use it!  Any chance of a refund please?

reply.author: Kurt Huwig
reply.content: Just send me your Google transaction id and I'll refund it.

title: Doesn't work on gear.

author: Shawn Puckett
comment: I like a few of the faces with my favorite being the Star Trek themed LCARS, but I do have one issue with the application.  With Samsung Gear Live watch the clock screen stays on all the time but to save power it dims the screen then changing the colors of the watch face to black and white, this of course works perfect with the watch faces included with the watch.  However in this product many of the watch faces, including LCARS, dim fine but instead of going to black and white they change to some funky ugly colors.  I would increase my rating if all the watches faces offer the correct black and white colors for the lower power setting on the Samsung Gear Live watch.
title: Not Bad for Samsung Gear Live

author: Nick H
comment: I like a lot of the ideas (particularly the xray) but the graphics are very low quality.  If the sharpness got tightened up a bit it would be a 4 or 5 star app.
title: Would be nice (moto 360), but

author: Rae Camarillo
comment: I downloaded the app, it said it worked for my gear 2, then after finding a watch face I liked,  found out I had to purchase the app. I did, just to find out the description had changed to say it doesn't support my watch. I really hope I get reimbursed and this isn't some bait and switch

reply.author: Kurt Huwig
reply.content: The app description has not changed in the last few months and it never said that it supports the Gear 2 as it never did. It only supports the Samsung Gear Live since the last update.

title: Wow... bait and switch?

author: Jim Chookagian
comment: Don't waste your time or money!!! It's very misleading saying it works with Sony SW2 when it's not even a watchface, it's an app
title: Doesn't work with Sony SW2

author: juneshia burney
comment: I have a Sony smartwatch and this app does not allow the user to select it as your main watch face. Totally useless.. nice faces but very pointless if it can't be displayed on your watch!
title: Does not work

author: J.D. Martinez
comment: Please add better functionality to Moto360, but good work. Looking forward to updates cause pacman one its awesome, but no battery display.
title: Not great on Moto360

author: John Newman
comment: This appears as an app on the Sony Smart Watch 2 and is therefore useless. Can hardly see the watch faces anyway as the are so dim, but the killer is that you cannot install them as the default watchface. Also no refund available - outrageous! Steer well clear!

reply.author: Kurt Huwig
reply.content: Google does not offer the possibilty to refund in-app purchases yet. If you want a refund, just send me a message with the transaction id and I will refund it.

title: Rubbish

author: Barry Shrum
comment: I'm using a Note 3 with SW2 and this app does not work on my devices.  I can view the watchfaces on my phone, but there is no way to apply them to the watch.  Sad really, as there are some nice designs.  UPDATE: Just switched to a Oneplus One and it still does not work. 2nd UPDATE: I did get a response from the developer stating his opinion that the app works with SW2, but as others have pointed out, it appears as an app on the watch, not in the watchface selection. Totally useless. Certainly not worth $4!

reply.author: Kurt Huwig
reply.content: The new version supports the Sony SW 2

title: Does not function

author: Sysroot 1
comment: The weather doesn't update on the Trek watch and the Square One watch.  And the date is wrong on the Simple watch! Rubbish!!
title: Its wrong

author: Rambling Thunder
comment: How do I make it stay on the watch face for my Sony smart watch 2? It keeps going back to my normal watch face.
title: Awesome

author: Josh Patton
comment: Alot of them don't dim properly on the Samsung live gear though,  as being able to turn off the functions that don't work on some devices,  like the mail buttons and such would be amazing,  still great whether or not.
title: Love the trek one

author: Martin Lyons
comment: Yes it drains the battery some but nice to have different watch faces apart from the bog standard ones.works fine on Sony mn2 just need to be patient with app don't expect it to start up  instantly 27 different watch faces plus some can change colour making up to 41 different watch faces if you charge watch before using it will last a good few hours

author: Sean Henderson
comment: I was so excited to add faces to my upgraded gear 1, I didn't realize this app was incompatible.
title: Read description carefully....

author: James Beecham
comment: My Omate Truesmart keeps flicking between "Omate detected" and locking up with "buy license". Your DRM is bad and you should feel bad.
title: Intermittent license

author: Richard Bell
comment: I have a Zgpax S8 and have got this as my lockscreen. If there was one thing to make it better allow the import of watchfaces from the likes of facerepo. Being able to import more choices of watchfaces would make this a great app.
title: Watchfaces

author: James Dickinson
comment: Regret paying for this. The watch face takes 1-2 seconds to show up, showing my actual home screen in the meantime when I unlock my watch.  Defeats the point of the application entirely.  Also, Swiping the clock doesn't unlock the phone, it changes the watchface. home button must be pressed to remove clock
title: Not worth it

author: Luke Thomas
comment: It states that it works with Sony Smartwatch 2 but it does not.  I purchased then purchased in app and it does not work.  Total Rip off DO NOT BUY.
title: DOES NOT WORK WITH SONY

author: BillyBelynda
comment: Bought full app and still wasn't able to get in to work with my smartwatch 2.
title: Didn't work with SW2

author: Scott King
comment: Appears as an app on the sony smart watch 2, but you cant set any of the faces as a watcg face
title: Dosent work

author: Jeff Schallenberg
comment: Works as a lock screen and/or a standalone watch app. Displays battery and weather in addition to date and time. You can add more watchfaces and you can even design and program your own watchface to add to the app!
title: Great on Neptune Pine
